mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hongpage.TB_FILE ( file_svname, file_regdate, file_brdno, file_path, file_ogname, file_size ) VALUES ( #{fsvname}, NOW(), #{bno}, #{fpath}, #{fogname}, #{fsize} )
mapper.select: SELECT file_no, file_ogname, file_svname, file_path, ROUND(file_size/1024) AS file_size FROM hongpage.TB_FILE WHERE file_brdno=#{bno}
SELECT file_no, file_ogname, file_svname, file_path, file_size FROM hongpage.TB_FILE WHERE file_no=#{fno}
